content.text: I'm doing well! I'm excited to start my new job at UC Santa Cruz.
That's great! What are you going to be studying there?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about going into business.
That's a good choice! Business is a great field to go into.
Thanks! I'm glad you think so.
I love to race go karts and drive my classic car. I'm also a big fan of Grey's Anatomy.
That's cool! I love to clean my house and run with my family and friends. I also love watching Grey's Anatomy.
That's awesome! We should hang out sometime and watch Grey's Anatomy together.
That would be fun! I'm free on Friday night.
Perfect! I'll text you the details later.
